item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Tyler Perry's Madea Movies [PLUTOTV/MGM+/TC/BD]
item.description:
Hi, sharelaynes!
I love Madea's movies, but it's so stressful to find them in bluray quality + hq pt-br audio + a live torrent.

Does anyone know how to rip video from plutotv?
Can you please rip it from plutotv?
https://pluto.tv/br/on-demand/movies/5fae76c4cfb475001a285c76

I would like to have a BD version with original audio, some 5.1 dubbed version in Brazilian Portuguese from streams and remux it to have the best version <3.

I'm also looking for these movies in BLURAY/HD streaming quality:
Madea Goes to Jail 2009
Madea's Big Happy Family 2011
Madea's Witness Protection 2012
https://www.primevideo.com/detail/0TISNMMATN0GH64BLVHKAZLM2H [mgm+ ptbr]
A Madea Christmas 2013
https://www.primevideo.com/region/na/detail/0OJTGQDX4W7US3YJFRQHM32EOA [mgm+ eng]
Boo! A Madea Halloween 2016
https://www.primevideo.com/region/na/detail/0M1X6227TFAG9MAWCUHNTPJ7Z3/ [telecine ptbr]
Boo 2! A Madea Halloween 2017
https://www.primevideo.com/region/na/detail/0KEMPT22026PQ5EB8SRMEP7P57 [mgm+ eng]
A Madea Family Funeral 2019
https://www.primevideo.com/region/na/detail/0GRS4SY2S2HNLIPLUDGSIXI30F [mgm+ ptbr]
A Madea Homecoming 2022
https://www.netflix.com/br/title/81510180

Thanks in advance.
item.author: SCANDAL
